content.question: Which of the following best captures how the author presents the relationship between public opinion and peace in the third paragraph?

choices.label: Peace enables public opinion to regulate human behavior effectively.
Peace allows the free expression of public opinion.
Public opinion is the most effective means of safeguarding peace.
Public opinion historically tends to favor peace.

content.answer: Public opinion is the most effective means of safeguarding peace.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
